metadata.title: CVE-2020-25729 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
ZoneMinder before 1.34.21 has XSS via the connkey parameter to download.phpor export.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.34.21-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.34.21-1ubuntu1').
